message: I propose we split the $10,000 equally. This ensures fairness in our division.
I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer.

Considering the inflation, I propose we divide the funds with a slight adjustment. I'll take $6000 and Bob, you'll receive $4000. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the diminishing value of money.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. I'll take 5500 and you can have 4500. It's still a fair split, but I'm willing to compromise a bit.
